00035 #ifndef PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_
00036 #define PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_
00037 
00038 #include <string>
00039 #include <sstream>
00040 #include <cassert>
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 #include "Exception.hpp"
00044 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00045 
00067 template <class Archive>
00068 class ProcessSpecificArchive
00069 {
00070 private:
00071 
00073     static Archive* mpArchive;
00074 
00075 public:
00076 
00078     static Archive* Get(void)
00079     {
00080         if (mpArchive == NULL)
00081         {
00082             EXCEPTION("A ProcessSpecificArchive has not been set up.");
00083         }
00084         return mpArchive;
00085     }
00086 
00092     static void Set(Archive* pArchive)
00093     {
00094         mpArchive = pArchive;
00095     }
00096 };
00097 
00098 #endif /*PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_*/
